item.title: 2022-08-22 Thank You Letter to Mr. Sylvia About Writing and Concision
item.description: 2022-08-22 Thank You Letter to Mr. Sylvia About Writing and Concision Dear Mr. Sylvia, I was a student in your 2019-2020 AP English Literature class.

item.title: Becoming
item.description: Becoming Her father had a disability She was undervalued in school Children know when they are being devalued Her ancestors’ participation in [[The Great Migration]] She participated in a completely different track in school for gifted children While it was “undemocratic,” it was a way “You talk like a white girl” Hiding her intelligence for fear of being brought down by other black people Obama continued to be controversial, having been mixed but “talking like a white man” People are afraid of being not black Counselor who said “You are not Princeton material” The best people do not get way more supportive people They surround themselves with people who know them, who know what they’re worth Meeting Obama A very cute origin story He was incredibly acknowledging of Duality: Both black and white Susanne’s death at 26 Incredibly moving and well written Anyone can die at any morning Obama‚Äôs cute proposal to Michelle How the presidency changes you Scrutiny on First Lady for dresses, behavior, etc.

item.title: It's Hard to Edit Writing
item.description: It’s Hard to Edit Writing We have [[Loss Aversion]] while editing. We have difficulty really engaging with our own writing.

item.title: Most People Have No Idea How to Write

item.title: Avoid the Phrase For Some Reason and Somehow
item.description: Avoid the Phrase For Some Reason and Somehow You can write phrases like “Maybe it was ‚Ä¶ or ‚Ä¶” If you say “somehow”, the reader immediately is thinking how

item.title: The Value of Content Density - EA Forum
item.description: The Value of Content Density - EA Forum Time limited Readers would want a post with 90% of the value and half the length Counterfactuals Trade off for reading your writing Approachability Don’t make things too technical References (References:: The value of content density - EA Forum)

item.title: Use the ‚Äúexecutive summary‚Äù Style Writing That Respects Your reader‚Äôs Time
item.description: Use the ‚Äúexecutive summary‚Äù Style Writing That Respects Your reader‚Äôs Time Put your key points up front. Use bullet points or numbered lists.

item.title: Show, Don't Tell
item.description: Show, Don’t Tell Use strong action verbs to show what you mean. Don’t use words like “is” to describe the siutation.

item.title: Summary First, Then Content
item.description: Summary First, Then Content Start your post or comment with a summary when posting anything over 3-5 paragraphs.

item.title: [[2022-06-29]] Helping Carrie with Architecture Essay
item.description: [[2022-06-29]] Helping Carrie with Architecture Essay Evidence must back up a Claim, otherwise it doesn’t mean anything Reminds me of Dad #Type/Joke [[Claim, Evidence, Warrant]] [[Copyright for AI Generated Content|Copying AI Generated Content isn’t Plagiarism]] Ultimately, Apple’s attempt to invoke the authority of classical architecture through association is superficial compared to Gehry’s more comprehensive approach.

item.title: Coding is to Programming Like Typing is to Writing
item.description: Coding is to Programming Like Typing is to Writing Writing requires mental effort. The words have some importance, but even they are secondary to the ideas that are being expressed.

item.title: My Problem is Abundance, Not Scarcity.
item.description: My Problem is Abundance, Not Scarcity. Abundance of ideas can often lead to a lack of direction or feelings of uncertainty.
